app.notInElectron: This application must be run inside the Openwork desktop app.

api.timeout: Request timed out. Please check your internet connection.
api.timeoutRetry: Request timed out. Please check your internet connection and try again.
api.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
api.connectionFailed: Failed to validate API key. Check your internet connection.

task.noSession: No session to continue - please start a new task

adapter.cliNotFound: OpenCode CLI is not available. The bundled CLI may be missing or corrupted. Please reinstall the application.
adapter.disposed: Adapter has been disposed and cannot start new tasks

validation.focusedWindowRequired: IPC request must originate from the focused window

ollama.protocolNotAllowed: Only http and https URLs are allowed
ollama.modelsArray: Invalid Ollama configuration: models must be an array
ollama.invalidModelFormat: Invalid Ollama configuration: invalid model format
ollama.connectionTimeout: Connection timed out. Make sure Ollama is running.

bedrock.invalidAwsCredentials: Invalid AWS credentials. Please check your Access Key ID and Secret Access Key.
bedrock.accessDenied: Access denied. Ensure your AWS credentials have Bedrock permissions.
bedrock.profileNotFound: AWS profile not found. Check your ~/.aws/credentials file.
bedrock.accessKeyRequired: Access Key ID and Secret Access Key are required

url.protocolNotAllowed: Only http and https URLs are allowed
